name: Last War: Apocalypse Strikes
storyline:
Recently a virus broke out, which infected large parts of the world's population. This zombie virus brought the infected people to attack the rest of the population. Only a few remained spared from the infection and fought back. The first wave of the zombies could be repulsed by combined forces. 
 
Subsequently, however, a dispute arose between the survivors about the supremacy and the new power conditions in the territories. The world needs your help to end this fight as soon as possible, because another wave of zombies is on the way ... 
 
For the imminent invasion of the zombies the cohesion of the survivors is in demand!
summary:
Recently a virus broke out, which infected large parts of the world's population. This zombie virus brought the infected people to attack the rest of the population. Only a few remained spared from the infection and fought back. The first wave of the zombies could be repulsed by combined forces. 
 
Subsequently, however, a dispute arose between the survivors about the supremacy and the new power conditions in the territories. The world needs your help to end this fight as soon as possible, because another wave of zombies is on the way ... 
 
For the imminent invasion of the zombies the cohesion of the survivors is in demand! 
 
Are you courageous enough to join the struggle for life and death? Do you have the determination to go beyond the apocalypse? Put your equipment together and help your team to achieve victory. 
Prove your skills in Last War! 
 
You can fight the war between the survivors alone (Free-for- all) or the team (Team Deathmatch). Grab your weapons and go! 
The fight against the zombies is imminent, put your equipment together in time to be prepared! 
 
Fps : Strike in the apocalypse from the ego shooter perspective.
